dataList.dlg: Charon’s not good at waiting. You get 100 seconds.
Leaving with Mephi if you’re late.
Passengers are hurt. Don’t cry.
Why did they turn into Mephi treats? Charon’s sad now.
Foes are all shimmy-shaky. A chance, isn’t it?
Charon did tell you to fasten your seatbelts.
Mephi had been peckish. Well done, right?
A passenger went all hush. Don’t forget to tick your tock later.
The bad guys are winning. Charon might just up and leave.
Woohoo. This side—the winners’ side.
…Mortal peril? Been taught this phrase.
The ground is shaking. Charon’s rumbly-tumbly too.
A mystery. No telling what will pop up.
A passenger gave them a boink.
That one did nothing. Dummy.
They said knowing what you did wrong is the first step.
Do you even have any idea what you did wrong? …Learnt that from a drama.
Those foes look like they’re in a good mood. It upsets Charon.
Look at them. They wanna toss cookies.
Did something good happen to the passengers?
…There’s a doggy bag below your seats. No throwing up on Mephi.
Kachlank. A spot broke. Keep forward.
Passengers just broke that. No one will tell us to pay for the damage, so go on.
Charon’s all spinny.
Eep, that looked hurty.
A huge success. Charon’s excited. Permission to sing?
Whoa! Charon’s shocked too.
“Two rats with one stone”, right? Charon will reward you with pats.
Charon appears. All rejoice.
